item.title: 'I'm here to entertain' - Alcaraz books semi-final spot
item.description: Carlos Alcaraz reaches the US Open semi-finals for the third time after comprehensive straight-set win against Jiri Lehecka.

item.title: Trump addresses online health rumours in Oval Office
item.description: In response to a reporter's question, the president said he was ‘very active’ over the Labor Day weekend.

item.title: Trump addresses online health rumours in Oval Office
item.description: In response to a reporter's question, the president said he was ‘very active’ over the Labor Day weekend.

item.title: Afghan quake victims buried on mountain top as aftershocks continue
item.description: The BBC's Yama Bariz travelled to a region devastated by the 6.0 magnitude earthquake.

item.title: Thousands of Israeli reservists report for duty ahead of Gaza City offensive
item.description: Ground forces are already pushing into the city, where hospitals say more than 50 people were killed by Israeli strikes on Tuesday.
